attributes.action: Call for immediate suspension or sacking of Secretary of State for Justice.
attributes.background: During an urgent question raised by Richard Burgon MP regarding the Prison Officer Protest Liz Truss knowingly lied to the House of Commons. When challenged by the media who have seen the proof, Liz Truss has repeatedly refused to apologise to the House and the POA for lying. This is unacceptable.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked or fired.
